Mailing Address: c/o Office of the Seniors AdvocatePO Box 9651 Stn Prov Govt1515 Blanshard StVictoria, BC     V8W 9P4
Service Details: - Provides information and referrals for individuals who are navigating seniors' services and tracks their concerns, which helps inform future work for the Seniors Advocate- Monitors and analyzes seniors' services and issues in BC, and makes recommendations to government and service providers to address systemic issues- Monitors services in five key areas: health care, housing, income supports, personal supports and transportation
Hours: Information and referral specialists are available by phone, Mon-Fri: 8:30am - 4:30pm (but closed statutory holidays)
Languages: English ; Translation services available in more than 180 languages
